Windlord:

Windlord felt weak every second and dificultly he could fire back or 
avoid  his enemies attack, he looked to Termitron fight and 
thought "I can't give up... I can't give up now... I have to fight... 
If I die, I'll die fightting..."

He dificulty stood up when he heard a sound, a sound that seemed be a 
Explosion. Quickly, Windlord shot 15 times against Train Wreck and 10 
agaisnt Banzai-tron.

he opened his comm link "Windlord to base... Do you copy? where're 
you??? What's going there????"
